.vs/

*.py[cod]
*.sqlite3
*.log
*.env
*.swp
.env/

# Ignore static and media (if collected/generated)
static/
media/

# Ignore OS files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

*/migrations/*.pyc
*/migrations/__pycache__/
